The Unknown - that post could still be taken as provocative, but I will try to answer your question if it helps.

I don't know why davidw's behaviour is tolerated here, but he does seem to be very good at making text adventures, and so probably has both some support and a sense that he is unassailable here.

I suppose the reason that the people who are answering back are all fairly new to interactive fiction is that those who know the scene better consider davidw to be something of a celebrity.

Personally, I enjoy his reviews of other people's work and would play his games too if it wasn't for his odious personality. It is a shame that someone with obvious talent and intelligence has to behave in the way that davidw does. Maybe he just doesn't have very good social skills or is a bit of a loner. I don't mean that as an insult, I'm just speculating that maybe he enjoys being alone and doesn't like people very much. Each to his own.

I hope that my humble opinion will help you, Unknown, so that you can stop posting this question.
